嚠字的基本解释

嚠
liú
古同“浏”。

嚠字的汉语字典释义

[①]［liú］
［《廣韻》力求切，平尤，來。］
［《廣韻》力久切，上有，來。］
亦作“嚠1”。“浏1”的繁体字。
(1)水深而清澈貌。
(2)水流。
(3)风疾貌。
(4)凉风。
(5)清凉。
(6)水名。也叫浏江，今名浏阳河。在湖南省东部。源出湘赣两省边境九岭山，西流经浏阳县到长沙市入湘江。
[②]［liū］
亦作“嚠2”。“浏2”的繁体字。
溜。偷偷地走开。

嚠字的康熙字典解释
嚠字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
嚠字的起名意思

暂无。

嚠
Basic explanation of words
嚠
liú
Gu Tong "Look".
嚠
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［liú］
["Guangyun" strives to cut, Pingyou, come. ]
["Guangyun" cuts hard for a long time, come on, come on. ]
Also known as "嚠1". Traditional Chinese characters for "Look 1".
(1) The water is deep and clear.
(2) Water flow.
(3) Windy appearance.
(4) Cool breeze.
(5) Cool.
(6) Water name. Also called Liujiang, now Liuyang River. In the east of Hunan Province. It originates from Jiuling Mountain on the border of Hunan and Jiangxi provinces and flows through Liuyang County to Changsha City and enters Xiangjiang River in the west.
[②]［liū］
Also known as "嚠2". Traditional Chinese characters for "Liu 2".
slip. Secretly walk away.
